title: Jeb: mojang增加新的程序员
author: chyx
txt_content:
本帖最后由 乙烯_中国 于 2016-10-11 18:24 编辑 

Jeb_:Happy to introduce our newest Minecraft (Java) developer, Maria Lemón! @mialem_n She's previously worked on Angry Birds 2 and Stardoll :)

Jeb_:很高兴向大家介绍我们新来的Minecraft (Java) 开发员  Maria Lemón！@mialem_n 她之前在 Angry Birds 2 和 Stardoll 工作:)


https://twitter.com/jeb_/status/785722900498243584
